articles.author: Sri Taylor, Allyson Versprille
articles.title: Americans Brace for Thanksgiving Travel Rush in Test of Airspace - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: US airlines are bracing for what stands to be the busiest Thanksgiving travel period on record, testing a strained aviation system that’s only just bounced back from flight restrictions prompted by the government shutdown.
